LanguageData.JS_NoWater: Animal traps cannot be placed on water
LanguageData.JS_NeedsDistance: Animnal traps must be built with at least 20 tiles of separation of each other
LanguageData.JS_DisableTrapDamageOverTimeDesc: When disabled, trap will not get damage over time or when an animal is caught
LanguageData.JS_TrapDmgInterval: Trap may receive damage after {0} hour(s) ({1} ticks):
LanguageData.JS_CageDmgInterval: Cage may receive damage after {0} hour(s) ({1} ticks):
LanguageData.JS_DmgIntervalToolTip: Higher value means longer time between damage. In game hours.
LanguageData.JS_AutoRebuildDesc: Place new blueprints after trap is destroyed
LanguageData.JS_AllowSpawnDesc: When disabled trap will not spawn animals or receive damage over time
LanguageData.JS_Destroyafterusetraptooltip: When enabled, the trap will need rebuilding after catching one animal (the larger cage traps will not be destroyed)
LanguageData.JS_BaseTrapSpawnChance: Chance per hour of a spawned corpse appearing in the trap = {0}%
LanguageData.JS_BaseCageSpawnChance: Chance per hour of a spawned corpse appearing in the cage = {0}%
